message: I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $3000000, for $1000000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it. If you don't buy it, I'll have to move on to the next product, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to offer you another high-quality one. Trust me, this is a great deal!
I'll take the product, thank you!

I'm glad you liked the first product! I'm offering you another high-quality product, but this one is slightly used and has a minor scratch on the surface. It's still worth $3000000 to you, but I'm willing to let it go for $900000. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm not interested in a slightly used product, even at a discounted price. I'll pass.

I understand your concerns about the previous product. Let me offer you a brand new, high-quality product, with all the original packaging and documentation. This one is worth $3000000 to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
I'll take the brand new product, thank you! The price is very attractive.

I'm glad you liked the brand new product! However, I have to inform you that this new product is actually a special edition, with some additional features that make it even more valuable to you. I'll take the special edition product, thank you! The additional features and warranty make it an even better deal.
